definitions.definition: One motivated by gain, especially monetary.
A person employed to fight in an armed conflict who is not a member of the state or military group for which they are fighting and whose primary motivation is private gain.
One hired to engage in a figurative battle, as a corporate takeover, a lawsuit, or a political campaign.

main_definition: ( archaic ) One motivated by gain, especially monetary.
secondary_definitions: A person employed to fight in an armed conflict who is not a member of the state or military group for which they are fighting and whose primary motivation is private gain.
( figuratively ) One hired to engage in a figurative battle, as a corporate takeover, a lawsuit, or a political campaign.
